attributes.action: Release an unredacted Russian Influence report for public viewing.
attributes.additional_details: Because the UK is  democracy and the electorate must be informed of any attempt to interfere in it.
attributes.background: In the light of Russian aggression in Ukrain release the full unredacted version for public viewing to better understand what has or has not been going on behind political obfuscation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what report you're referring to. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a public inquiry into Russian interference in UK politics: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609388
